item.title: Mud & Blood: SIGIL & SHADOW Actual Play!
item.description: I was honored to have the chance to run SIGIL & SHADOW for the Mud & Blood podcast’s Halloween Special! Just a fun note: this episode essentially counts as Part 5 of The Wythe Case!
